alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 30 at 3:11PM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 18 inches possible above 8000 feet. Accumulations of 3 to 8 inches between 5000 and 8000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on Highway 168 west of Bishop.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
